headlines: Crypto’s ‘super app’ race is on as industry enters aggregation era: Report
Here’s what happened in crypto today
Agencies announce dollar thresholds for applicability of truth in lending and consumer leasing rules for consumer credit and lease transactions
Agencies announce dollar thresholds for smaller loan exemption from appraisal requirements for higher-priced mortgage loans
Federal Reserve Board announces approval of application by The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc.
events: Independent audit verifies gold reserves backing Kyrgyzstan's USDKG stablecoin
Visa and Circle's USDC settlement pilot with U.S. banks (institutional adoption)
Institutional selling of Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs ($582M outflow)
Bitcoin price drop toward $85,000 with broader crypto market sell-off
JPMorgan launches its first tokenized money market fund on Ethereum
